text: @Yamiche @jonathanvswan What? The corona virus is not at it’s peak! About to hit  1 million cases and messed up testing. Leave it to trump to think if he stops talking about covid19 it will go away. Outrageous. His daily bs hour won’t be missed  and he’ll just tweet more lies every day.
